mdRecord.dcterms:title: [Chart of the discoveries and route of His Majesty's Ships Hecla and Griper in search of a North West Passage, under the command of Lieutt. (now Captain) Parry, in the years 1819 and 1820 / and drawn under his immediate inspection by John Bushman ..]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bushman, John. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: An untitled version, without the continuation pasted at bottom right, of the map that later appeared in Parry's Journal of a voyage for the discovery of a north-west passage ..., London, John Murray, 1821. [original]
Covers the area from Baffin Bay west to Liddon's Gulf. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Inscribed on verso: J. Fane Esqr. &c-- Mr. Pa[?] verey respectful compts. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hecla (Ship)
Griper (Ship)
Arctic Archipelago (Nunavut and N.W.T.)--Maps
Northwest Passage--Maps
